#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
       int T;
       unsigned long long int fact,N;
       
       scanf("%d",&T);
       
       while(T--)
       {
         scanf("%lld",&N);
         fact = 1;
         for(int i=1;i<=N;i++)
         {
            fact *= i;
         }
         printf("%lld\n",fact);
       }
       
       return 0;
       }
